trans-unit.source: Provides the system implementation for displaying a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a implementação do sistema para exibir uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ContextMenuService class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu.
trans-unit.target: A classe ContextMenuService fornece propriedades anexadas que podem ser usadas para especificar a aparência e a posição de um menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: Many of the properties in the ContextMenuService class are also defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Muitas das propriedades na classe ContextMenuService também são definidas por <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the ContextMenuService class than by setting the properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Às vezes é mais conveniente definir as propriedades usando a classe ContextMenuService que definindo as propriedades em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> to be shared by multiple elements, but use the ContextMenuService class to specify a different position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> for each element.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>para serem compartilhados por vários elementos, mas usar a classe ContextMenuService para especificar uma posição diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>para cada elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and ContextMenuService classes.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes propriedades são definidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>e classes de ContextMenuService.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If any of these properties are set on both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and the ContextMenuService, the property value from the ContextMenuService is used.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma dessas propriedades são definidas em ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>e ContextMenuService, o valor de propriedade de ContextMenuService é usado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A> You can also use the ContextMenuService to display menus on disabled items.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A>Você também pode usar o ContextMenuService para exibir menus em itens desabilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Object to query concerning whether it has a drop shadow.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value, **true** if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> has a drop shadow; **false** otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano, **true** se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> possui uma sombra; **false** caso contrário.
